bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: Please update this package. I've also submitted an ACL request to help out. To approve it, please go to https://admin.fedoraproject.org/pkgdb/package/rpms/python-pyvmomi/

Hello Fabio,
I have approved the request. Thanks for helping out. Ive moved into a new role working on OpenStack so I just dont spend much time with VMWare these days.
python-pyvmomi-6.0.0.2016.6-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-51739f0007
